mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.office_name FROM DRIVER_HELPER_INFO A LEFT JOIN OFFICE B ON A.office_id = B.office_id WHERE driver_helper_idx = #{driverHelperIdx}

SELECT A.*, B.bus_dismiss_time_idx, B.first_time as dismiss_first_time, B.second_time as dismiss_second_time, B.third_time as dismiss_third_time, B.fourth_time as dismiss_fourth_time, B.fifth_time as dismiss_fifth_time, B.sixth_time as dismiss_sixth_time, C.* FROM BUS_INFO A LEFT JOIN BUS_DISMISS_TIME B ON A.bus_idx = B.bus_idx LEFT JOIN BUS_ATTEND_TIME C ON A.bus_idx = C.bus_idx WHERE A.bus_idx = #{busIdx} ORDER BY C.sort_number ASC

SELECT count(A.driver_idx) FROM DRIVER_INFO A LEFT JOIN OFFICE B ON A.office_id = B.office_id LEFT JOIN BUS_INFO C ON A.driver_idx = C.driver_idx WHERE 1=1
AND A.office_id = #{officeId}
AND B.office_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND C.start_route_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR C.end_route_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND A.driver_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
SELECT B.office_name, A.driver_helper_idx, A.helper_name, A.serve_yn, A.create_date FROM DRIVER_HELPER_INFO A LEFT JOIN OFFICE B ON A.office_id = B.office_id WHERE A.driver_idx = #{driverIdx}

SELECT A.bus_idx, A.route_number, A.start_route_name, A.end_route_name, A.bus_type, A.bus_status, A.apply_start_date, A.apply_end_date, (SELECT count(*) FROM BUS_ATTEND_TIME WHERE bus_idx = #{busIdx}) as attend_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM BUS_DISMISS_TIME WHERE bus_idx = #{busIdx}) as dismiss_count FROM BUS_INFO A WHERE A.driver_idx = #{driverIdx}
